snippet.title: Revhead - Trailer
snippet.description:
Revhead is a car racing simulation game, where you have to build your own race car.
You have a friend Charlie, who is busy with building race cars. He would need some help from you and he invites you to Australia. You start your journey somewhere in a small village in Australia, where the only way to get recognised if you are able to build the fastest and best racing car around. You have Charlie, his expertise and his garage. The rest is up to you! 
Be smart and use your resources wisely, then you can build up as many cars you need!
If you would run out of money, you can always ask Charlie for some job. There is always something you can do in the garage! 
Grow your car value with earning racing points and keeping them in prefect condition, challenge others to win their rides, accomplish missions to build custom cars for customers and earn local's respect.

Either way, there will be one question at the end. Can you be the next Revhead?
